data.name: Moonlighter (Original Soundtrack)
data.detailed_description:
Moonlighter (Original Soundtrack)

Slaying monsters and running the store at the same time is not a simple task, but everything becomes easier if you have a proper tune to aid you! In the soundtrack, you’ll find all the songs you know from WIll’s adventure in Moonlighter. All tracks mastered and mixed for the digital version of the album, delivered in various formats ( 320kbps .MP3, .WAV, .FLAC). Along with the music, you’ll receive multiple digital goods, that can be used to customize your computer or smartphone.

This package includes:

23 tracks from the soundtrack for the game (320 kbps .MP3, .WAV, .FLAC)
3 bonus tracks (.MP3, .WAV, .FLAC)
5 wallpapers for your computer
4 phone wallpapers for your smartphone
5 ringtones for your smartphone

Tracklist:

Beyond the Gates
Will's Theme
Village of Rynoka
The Moonlighter
Forbidden Steps
Sentient Stone
Gaining Courage
Golem King
Onsen
Macadamia Mayhem
Restless Roots
Botanical Brigade
Carnivorous Mutae
Journey through the Ancient Sands
Dancing Fire
Naja
Tired Rynoka
The Abandoned Laboratory
Haywire
Uncontrolled Variables
Energy Flux
The Void
The Heroic Merchant
Rynoka Variations (Bonus Track)
Dreams of Adventures (Bonus Track)
Moonlighter Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer (Pablo Caballero)


Tracks 1-25 Composed & Produced by David Fenn. Track 26 Composed & Produced by Pablo Caballero.

David Fenn is a composer and sound designer from the UK who has been scoring indie games ever since his Ludum Dare entry. Titan Souls took home The Best Game and The Best Music awards in 2013. His style focuses on strong melodies and memorable motifs amidst lush and detailed instrumentation, always aiming to both support the gameplay and add an extra layer of emotion that takes you on a journey of its own.
